flavorText.text:
はったつした　みみを　たてて
まわりの　けはいを　さぐる。
なにかあると　すぐに　とびかかる。

すぐに　おこって　たたかおうとする。
しかも　あたまの　ツノは　ささると
きょうれつな　どくそをだす　しくみ。

ダイヤモンドよりも　かたい　ツノを　もつ。
てきの　けはいを　かんじると　せなかの　トゲが
いっせいに　さかだち　ぜんりょくで　たちむかう。

ダイヤモンドよりも　かたい　ツノを　もつ。
てきの　けはいを　かんじると　せなかの　トゲが
いっせいに　さかだち　ぜんりょくで　たちむかう。

あたまにある　ツノの　どくそは
つきさしたときの　しょうげきで
にじみでる　しくみだ。

あたまにある　ツノの　どくそは
つきさしたときの　しょうげきで
にじみでる　しくみだ。

ダイヤモンドより　かたい　ツノで
がんせきを　くだいて　まわる。
つきのいしを　さがして　いるのだ。

しんけいしつで　けんかっぱやい。
たいないの　アドレナリンが　ふえると
どくその　のうども　たかまるぞ。

신경질적이고 호전적이다.
체내의 아드레날린이 증가하면
독소의 농도도 높아진다.

발달한 귀를 세워
주위의 낌새를 살핀다.
무슨 일이 생기면 바로 덤벼든다.

금방 화를 내며 싸우려 든다.
게다가 머리의 뿔은 찔리면
강렬한 독소를 내는 구조이다.

다이아몬드보다 단단한 뿔을 지녔다.
적의 기척을 느끼면 등에 달린 가시를
일제히 세우고 전력을 다해 맞선다.

다이아몬드보다 단단한 뿔을 지녔다.
적의 기척을 느끼면 등에 달린 가시를
일제히 세우고 전력을 다해 맞선다.

머리에 있는 뿔의 독소는
찌르는 순간의 충격으로
흘러나오는 구조다.

머리에 있는 뿔의 독소는
찌르는 순간의 충격으로
흘러나오는 구조다.

다이아몬드보다 단단한 뿔로
암석을 부수며 다닌다.
달의돌을 찾고 있는 것이다.

神經質且容易發脾氣打架。
當體內的腎上腺素增加時，
毒素的濃度也會提升。

頭上的角含有毒素，
當角撞穿了什麼東西時，
毒素就會隨著衝擊而流出。

頭上的角含有毒素，
當角撞穿了什麼東西時，
毒素就會隨著衝擊而流出。

會用比鑽石還要堅硬
的角到處擊碎岩石，
藉此尋找月之石。

D’un tempérament violent, il
empale l’ennemi sur sa corne
qui distille un poison puissant.

D’un tempérament violent, il
empale l’ennemi sur sa corne
qui distille un poison puissant.

Il dresse ses oreilles à l’affût d’un bruit suspect et
attaque toute menace se rapprochant de lui.

Très agressif, il est prompt à répondre à la violence.
La corne sur sa tête est venimeuse.

Nidorino dispose d’une corne plus dure que du diamant.
S’il sent une présence hostile, toutes les pointes de son dos
se hérissent d’un coup, puis il défie son ennemi.

Nidorino dispose d’une corne plus dure que du diamant.
S’il sent une présence hostile, toutes les pointes de son dos
se hérissent d’un coup, puis il défie son ennemi.

Sa corne est venimeuse. Si elle perce un ennemi,
elle lui injecte un poison violent.

Sa corne est venimeuse. Si elle perce un ennemi,
elle lui injecte un poison violent.

Il erre à la recherche d’une Pierre Lune,
brisant tous les rochers sur son passage
avec sa corne plus solide qu’un diamant.

D’un naturel nerveux, il est prompt à se battre.
Lorsqu’il a une montée d’adrénaline,
la concentration de son poison augmente.

Es überwacht mit seinen riesigen Ohren die Umgebung.
Registriert es eine Bewegung, greift es an.

Ein aggressives Pokémon, das sehr flink angreift.
Das Horn auf dem Kopf sondert starkes Gift ab.

Nidorino besitzt ein Horn, das sogar härter ist als ein
Diamant. Wenn es einen Feind wahrnimmt, stellen sich
all die Widerhaken auf seinem Rücken auf und es schlägt
den Gegner mit aller Kraft in die Flucht.

Nidorino besitzt ein Horn, das sogar härter ist als ein
Diamant. Wenn es einen Feind wahrnimmt, stellen sich
all die Widerhaken auf seinem Rücken auf und es schlägt
den Gegner mit aller Kraft in die Flucht.

Das Horn dieses Pokémon sondert im Kampf ein
sehr starkes Gift ab, wenn es den Gegner trifft.

Das Horn dieses Pokémon sondert im Kampf ein
sehr starkes Gift ab, wenn es den Gegner trifft.

Auf der Suche nach einem Mondstein zerstört es
Felsen mit seinem Horn, das härter ist als ein
Diamant.

Es ist nervös und wird schnell aggressiv. Steigt
sein Adrenalinspiegel, erhöht sich gleichzeitig
auch die Konzentration seines Gifts.

Levanta sus grandes orejas para vigilar. Si detecta
algo, atacará de inmediato.

Un Pokémon agresivo, siempre listo para atacar.
El cuerno de la cabeza segrega un potente veneno.

Nidorino tiene un cuerno de dureza superior a la del diamante.
Si siente una presencia hostil, se le erizan las púas del lomo
enseguida y carga contra el enemigo con todas sus fuerzas.

Nidorino tiene un cuerno de dureza superior a la del diamante.
Si siente una presencia hostil, se le erizan las púas del lomo
enseguida y carga contra el enemigo con todas sus fuerzas.

El cuerno de su frente contiene toxinas que se
liberan al punzar al rival.

El cuerno de su frente contiene toxinas que se
liberan al punzar al rival.

Dondequiera que va, parte rocas con su cuerno,
más duro que un diamante, en busca de una
Piedra Lunar.

Es nervioso y agresivo por naturaleza. Cuando
suben sus niveles de adrenalina, la concentración
de toxinas en su veneno aumenta.

Rizza le grandi orecchie per esaminare la zona.
Se avverte qualcosa, attacca immediatamente.

Pokémon aggressivo sempre pronto all’attacco,
secerne un veleno potente dal corno sulla testa.

Nidorino è dotato di un corno più duro del diamante. Quando
percepisce una presenza ostile, gli si rizzano immediatamente
tutti gli aculei sulla schiena. A questo punto sfida il nemico
con tutta la sua forza.

Nidorino è dotato di un corno più duro del diamante. Quando
percepisce una presenza ostile, gli si rizzano immediatamente
tutti gli aculei sulla schiena. A questo punto sfida il nemico
con tutta la sua forza.

Quando colpisce il nemico con il suo corno
durante la lotta, questo secerne un forte veleno.

Quando colpisce il nemico con il suo corno
durante la lotta, questo secerne un forte veleno.

Vaga alla ricerca di una Pietralunare frantumando
rocce con il suo corno più duro del diamante.

È irritabile e sempre pronto a battersi. Quando
il livello di adrenalina nel suo corpo si alza,
aumenta anche la concentrazione di tossine.

An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

An aggressive
POKéMON that is
quick to attack. The horn on its
head secretes a
powerful venom.

Its horns contain
venom. If they
are stabbed into an enemy, the
impact makes the
poison leak out.

It raises its big
ears to check its
surroundings. If it senses any­
thing, it attacks
immediately.

Quick to anger, it
stabs enemies with
its horn to inject a powerful poison
when it becomes
agitated.

It is easily
agitated and uses
its horn for offense as soon as
it notices an
attacker.

NIDORINO has a horn that is harder than
a diamond. If it senses a hostile
presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges
the foe with all its might.

NIDORINO has a horn that is harder than
a diamond. If it senses a hostile
presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges
the foe with all its might.

Its horn is harder than a diamond.
If it senses a hostile presence, all the
barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it
challenges the foe with all its might.

It is easily angered. By swinging its well-
developed horn wildly, it can even punch
through diamond.

An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to
attack. The horn on its head secretes a
powerful venom.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It raises its big ears to check its
surroundings. If it senses anything,
it attacks immediately.

Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with
its horn to inject a powerful poison
when it becomes agitated.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It has a violent disposition and
stabs foes with its horn, which
oozes poison upon impact.

It raises its big ears to check its surroundings.
If it senses anything, it attacks immediately.

An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack.
The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses
a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once,
and it challenges the foe with all its might.

Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses
a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once,
and it challenges the foe with all its might.

Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an
enemy with the horn, the impact makes
the poison leak out.

Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an
enemy with the horn, the impact makes
the poison leak out.

With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this
Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it
searches for a moon stone.

It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively.
The potency of its poison increases along with
the level of adrenaline present in its body.

头上的犄角里含有毒素，
当犄角撞穿了什么东西时，
毒素就会随着冲击而流出。

头上的犄角里含有毒素，
当犄角撞穿了什么东西时，
毒素就会随着冲击而流出。

见着岩石，就会用自己比
钻石还硬的角将其弄碎。
它这么做是为了寻找月之石。

神经敏感，动不动就打架。
体内的肾上腺素一增加，
毒素的浓度也会提高。
